website_summaries.verdict: A great, inexpensive table and chairs that fit in a small space but has a classy look and feel.
pros: An ideal piece for a breakfast nook or corner dining table

customer_reviews.title: You will love it!
customer_reviews.text: After all the pictures I saw of the table being damaged I was pretty nervous, but decided to take my chances. I am so glad that it did! I purchased this as a breakfast table to put in my kitchen. It was easy to assemble my friend and I put it together in a little over an hour from opening the box to having it all in place. A drill was the only tool needed that it did no come with and that was to secure the cushions to the stool which you don't really need to do because it fits securely without the screws.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Set, Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this the other day and I LOVEEEE it! I'm somewhat of a skeptic when it comes to buying furniture off Amazon, but I bought this set (bought the chairs off Amazon as well since I wanted a bar stool with a back to it) and I couldn't be any happier with it. The faux marble and cherry wood match the rest of my furniture in my house and it is very sturdy. Being a woman, this was super easy to out together as well being it has all the holes and posts put in for you and all you need to so is simply screw on the legs to the top.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for The price , chairs are not very comfortable but for The pics is great .
customer_reviews.author: Ana isabella Hurtado

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a bistro!
customer_reviews.text: Great table! I ordered this on Wednesday and it arrived Thursday morning....in a snow storm....amazing delivery! The box was banged up but there where zero damage to the table or stools. I have a tiny apartment where I have one big room and a kitchen, no dining area, and this fits so nicely up against a wall where I could easily seperate living from dining. I also have a 6 year old that is up and down of course on the stools and they've never come loose. Very easy to put together as well, took maybe 20 min. I love this table!
customer_reviews.author: Gabi

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Sturdy as you'd expect a hand put ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Sturdy as you'd expect a hand put together table and stools to be. The seat cushions on the stools are very nice. The tile top of the table is also nice and the wood is a rich fisnish. I recommend this. Great cheap buy. I'm using it as a desk.
customer_reviews.author: aolande1

customer_reviews.title: The Problem: The Paper-Wrapped Top
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set three years ago. The wood components are still as beautiful as the day it arrived. The paper wrapped faux marble top...not so much. If it gets any moisture or humidity sitting on it for any amount of time, the paper swells up and the layers separate. There is no way to get the swollen bubbles out and if it happens on the edge it expands like a sponge. It’s a pity, because the rest of the table (and pub stools) wore so well. I just wish the top were wood as too or at least laminated well. The virtue of the top ruins what could be a lasting piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Queen of the Rodeo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect set for date night and excellent price!
customer_reviews.text: Let me just start off saying I am extremely happy with this purchase! It looks better than I thought it would and it's pretty sturdy. Assembly was pretty easy as well with the only part you have to be careful on is the screws that go into the seat cushion. Be careful not to over tighten because it seems to strip the wood pretty easy. Other than that this was a excellent deal and I'm glad I found it. My wife and I needed a bench and chairs for date night we were going to have outside and I couldn't believe I found this for that price.
customer_reviews.author: allen dunbar

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: Table is some what sturdy. But this product is poorly made. I couldn’t get one of the chairs assembled because they simply didn’t built the holes to put it together on one side. And a screwed was a bit bigger so I had to really force it. I will say it is nice. And I’m sure it will have 5 stars if whatever factory makes this pays more attention to it.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Upon opening and removing all the parts, I realized that the table top was separated from the support boards. A few holes had screws missing and quite a few were just pulled out of the top. I had to carefully remove the screws and replace them with bigger screws. After about twenty minutes of careful rework, I was able to make the table useable and sturdy again. It's pretty sad when $100 can't even buy something of decent quality anymore. Anybody looking to buy this table, take your money elsewhere. I won't be buying anything from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Basham

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance after all of the reviews concerning quality assurance. I got lucky and the table was in mint condition with all of the hardware included. I did end up screwing the seat cushions unlike the other reviews. The look simulates a genuine granite slab and I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this table because Ive owned the full size one and I thought the price was a steal. Overall, im satisfied with the product. it looks nice, fits in a small area and the fact that you can slide the stools under is ideal. The table top is not made of any type of stone. It appears to be some type of wood with vinyl covering it. Doesnt look cheap and it seems pretty sturdy. A bit wobbly though. It does come in pieces and requires basic assembly, tool is included in packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Edwing m.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Addition for Our Tiny Home
customer_reviews.text: This will be the main kitchen table for us in our new tiny home. There are just two of us, so we each get a stool. Attractive, and the stools are comfy. Putting the table together was a cinch (remember the washers), but the stools were a bit more complex for us. Maybe if you are good at assembling it will be easier. The table is a bit top-heavy, so good to have a wall support. Pretty to look at, and after testing, the table surface is durable and easy to clean. Quite happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Hagler Wong

customer_reviews.title: SUCH A CUTE TABLE!!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this table so much!!! Putting it together was relatively easy, the only issue is one of the legs didn't line up with the screw so I had to sand down some of the wood to make it fit. If that didn't happen it would of been a 5 star for easy assembly. The only other thing is the little brown caps that you put in to hide the screws fall out very easily. Overall, I still love this table and stools!!!
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this table!! We are sending it back!!! Damaged and used not worth the money!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The minute I opened the box I realized the wood was damaged. There were no instructions so I had to print them myself. The table top is chipped, the screws are mislabeled, the wood was clearly attached at one point so it will no longer screw back into the same holes. You can tell it was glued together at one point. Even the instructions do not explain the proper order of putting it together. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Tabconn

customer_reviews.title: Good little table
customer_reviews.text: Good little table. I rent a room and need a place to eat besides my bed, and I also wanted enough space for my boyfriend to eat as well, but also wanted something suitable for a desk. This works perfect as a dining table for 2 and a desk! Plenty of room, but also fits in a little nook in my room, so it doesn't take up too much space (I have a medium-sized room that has enough space for a queen bed and then a couple of feet). It took me a while to put together, but I'm honestly not good with building things. The table took maybe 15 minutes, but the chairs took me over an hour...
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: This is the dumbest thing
customer_reviews.text: Received without instructions or a single screw or any assembly hardware of any kind. Just a box with styrofoam and useless wood pieces. Rather than just ship out replacement hardware, Amazon's only option is to ship out an entirely new table/stool set so I can open it, take out the hardware and instructions, then tape the box back up and wait for UPS to come pick it back up. I'm sure the last option will present its own special kind of hell. This wins the award for most idiotic transaction I've ever had on Amazon in my life.
customer_reviews.author: C. Payne

customer_reviews.title: Will not stay together
customer_reviews.text: I got this today. It has required 2 trips to a hardware store to buy glue a clamp and different screws. I still have no if these stools are going to stay together. We have now glued it and hopes that that will work. The screws included with them just fall out like it was drilled incorrectly or something. I wanted to just reach out to the seller but there was not an option to do so. I am beyond frustrated as we have The table put together so returning is really not an option.
customer_reviews.author: Kennedy Worthen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for those who dont need an actual dining table
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small table to fit in my kitchen. We are "living room eaters" and don't need a big dining room table. The 4-seat table I have (gifting soon) is taking up space I could use to expand my living room. So this table is great if you need a small table for company or to eat on occasionally. Assembly took about an hour. The toughest was the chairs. Table is a bit wobbly and chairs are decent enough for the price. Would not use the chairs every day so it's nice they fit under the table. FYI, The little brown "nail coverings" pop out very easily so I don't use them. All in all it's a great buy
customer_reviews.author: C.Breezy

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This is so cheap! The construction is terrible. It came broken but I didn't want to wake my energy returning it so we made due. It's very wobbly. The edges are sharp so if you have kids DO NOT GET THIS! The stools are very uncomfortable and the edges of the table look so dull and ugly compared to the top. I only need this until I love again next year so I honestly don't care how crappy it is. It's just going into the dumpster when I move anyways. The threads inside the holes were set unevenly so trying to assemble it was a chore.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. The table was chipped up when I got it and it seems like every week I have to relighted every nut bolt on the table so it doesn’t fall apart while I’m eating. It’s just me and my fiancé and we only use it for dinner at night and couple more meals on the weekend when we’re home all day together. It is what is it. We needed something quick.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony E.

customer_reviews.title: The table top was damaged, but that's not why ...
customer_reviews.text: The table top was damaged, but that's not why it gets two stars. One of the barstools came with a piece that didn't fit. I compared it to the other barstool piece to make sure I wasn't crazy. The dowel rods were placed where the screws were supposed to go, making it impossible to assemble the barstool. In all my years assembling Ikea-esque furniture, this was a first for me. I couldn't find any contact information for the manufacturer, so I contacted Amazon, who gave me a phone number, where I couldn't actually speak to a human. I'm going to the hardware store to see if they can fix the piece for me but....you had one job, Linon.
customer_reviews.author: Jessalynn46657

customer_reviews.title: Nice set but the possibility of missing parts its true
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set for the price. At first glance, it looks very expensive so your guests won't know how cheap it was. Great for small spaces but big enough for a few people to sit around and set their drinks. Easy to assemble except we were missing a screw for one of the stools so amazon had to send us a brand new set so we could take out the missing screw for our stool and then send it back with the missing piece. It was done that way because reaching the vendor was nearly impossible. Even with that inconvenience, it was a great buy! Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ivette Roberson

customer_reviews.title: Over & beyond!!
customer_reviews.text: WOW! Jus WOW!! This table went over and beyond my expectations! The timing from placing the order to receiving the table was phenomenal. I purchased 2 and assembling them was just as easy as placing the order. I really thought I could build my own house after putting these together, LOL.. will most definitely buy again from this seller
customer_reviews.author: 🍃Set apart & chosen🍃

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it ! Twice came in damaged
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this set for my new apartment and when we went to open it it was missing pieces and the marble top corner was broken . Asked for a replacement waited another week and it came in once again broken . I’ve given up on this ! Package the product correctly or make the product more sturdy cause twice in a row is insane and frustrating
customer_reviews.author: May

customer_reviews.title: You will be happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: What I like about this product, the table setting can be used for anything you desire for (breakfast) (office) (eating area) (floral area) what ever you desire. I love this product, I surely needed a table I can use for a studio apt and not use to much space. Perfect, makes your space look very welcoming. For the price, it’s wonderful. The wood seem to be a strong. Cushions on the stools are comfy, I’m very content with this product. I sure will recommend to people if they want something suitable for their basic needs.. I do say! The top of the table material is cheaply made but the price is perfect....
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Estrada

customer_reviews.title: Need a better solution for those
customer_reviews.text: Our first table had multiple defects and breaks in the wood. We returned it to then find out that this company only refunded $97 instead of the $109 for THEIR broken furniture. Received our new one and it works well with out any defects. Although every screw thag holds the seat down in the stools have all fallen out multiple times. Need a better solution for those. Disappointed for the fact that this was a wedding gift and the company apparently doesn't like to give full refunds!
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy due to complications with assembly
customer_reviews.text: This set would get 5 stars if the chairs weren't so complicated to put together. All the assembly was easy except for placing the tops of the chairs onto the legs. While trying to put in the screws two of them became bold so now the tops wont stay on so the chairs are basically useless now. The table is sturdy and easy to put together
customer_reviews.author: Thomas K. Hutchison

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking table/stools not the best quality although it looks more expensive then it is. One of the corners had a little damage from shipping but other then that it was easy to put together. Only problem I had was getting the wood pegs to stay on the stools but I probably just need a little wood glue. That really doesn’t bother me. It’s sturdy, very nice looking and great for small spaces! I’m very happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Arely8930

customer_reviews.title: The stools fit completely under the table
customer_reviews.text: It is the perfect size and looks very nice. The fact that the stools fit completely under the table is an important space-savings feature. It is an inexpensive piece of furniture but looks quite nice and is perfect for my use. Bearing in mind the low cost, the laminate on the top is as much as I expected at this price point. It is not thick so I covered it with a clear plastic tablecloth for a little extra protection.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble. Has instructions. GREAT TABLE
customer_reviews.text: I thought i brought the black one but it’s alright. It still turned out nice and i like that this gave me more colors to add to the kitchen. It took me about an hour to assemble everything , that’s because i was watching a movie , kept getting distracted lol chairs are sturdy, long as you tighten up ALL THE Screws. I probably will never sit at this table because i use the dining room table but it’s great for displays lol
customer_reviews.author: PrincessLuLu

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: I quite like what I received. Everything was packed well, only one small flaw on the table that’s barely noticeable and quite possibly my fault, as I was banging it around trying to move it. Easily put together by one solo female, directions were very clear. All pieces were included. It looks cute in my new apartment and I’m very happy. I ended up swapping out the bar stools and putting them under my actual kitchen bar, and using chairs with backs instead, but the stools themselves are fine and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed-should have build my own for all the work to repair.
customer_reviews.text: The finish on the top of the bar surface was torn and missing a piece. The box that it arrived in was beat up. One of the stools was stripped out to screw the cushion down to. Had to put it together and had to have a different way to assemble. the underneath of the table top had to be rescrewed together as screws were falling out, and still has gaps where the support brace sections should be snug and sturdy. If is wasn't such a pain to rebox and return, i would have. Significantly disappointed in this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great table for a small space 🙏🏽🙏🏽
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for $157 .... It’s actually very nice , stools are very sturdy ...I’m 195 lbs and the stools hold me perfectly, I was scared at first by some of the reviews but my purchase came quickly, in perfect condition and delivered with care. I would recommend this set if you are just looking for something to get you by until you can either afford a better set or have a small space.... it’s perfect in my tiny kitchen . 😊🙌🏽
customer_reviews.author: Sharifa_Diva

customer_reviews.title: Great set at a great price. Doesn’t look cheap.
customer_reviews.text: 100% as pictured. Easy to assemble. Instructions were easy for me to get as I put it together myself. Table assembled in less than 10 minutes both stools took at least 25-30 minutes together. It’s sturdy and well worth the price. It’s perfect for small kitchens. I love the fact that it doesn’t look cheap. Has a lil weight to it. I decided to use a lil wood glue while putting it together to add to keeping it together, just in case over time the screws loosen up.
customer_reviews.author: Bunny

customer_reviews.title: Great value, great product
customer_reviews.text: There were a number of buyers here who had unfortunate experiences with damaged product. I was not one of them. The table is extremely sturdy and easy to assemble. The stools are small and comfortable but I opted to get two bar stools with backs. For those of you who like to cook or bake, this table is PERFECT for that. You could easily flour the surface and roll out dough, and the height means your back won't ache. Of course, I'm 6'5" so maybe you won't have that issue. A great purchase all around, and a great value.
customer_reviews.author: P-Lo

customer_reviews.title: Stool Screws Pay Careful Attention ! Watch video!
customer_reviews.text: Who said a woman can't do it! I put this together all by myself and boy did I nail the size for this space!!!! I love it❤️❤️❤️❤️ It arrived on time and was package carefully. I very impressed with the delivery person who waited at the door until I answered. 👍👍 I opened it up alone and started assembling it by myself. So ladies if I can do it anyone can!
customer_reviews.author: RainSings

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy little table
customer_reviews.text: Got this because I had no furniture and was waiting on movers...7 years ago back in 2013 and it fit in my kitchen nook. I moved and my dad kept it in his garage and even gave to a friend then I moved back and needed it again, and here it is in my new place for now. My dad used it a lot and he’s not a small guy. It’s sturdy and lasts forever. Some peeling over time which is easily fixed with glue. It’s seen a beer with a good friend, pizza dinners with dad. Has been a good trusty friend. I didn’t expect this quality for under $100. We all use it when we need it.
customer_reviews.author: Alisa Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Great looking Table. But not Sturdy enough
customer_reviews.text: Due to the current situation (Covid-19) most us have been working from home and see an actual need to setup our home office. So was looking for something which could be fit in a small space and ran into this product which indeed was affordable and looking great. I was able to set this up in about 35mins and felt it was sturdy. But after using it for a week, I feel like it's woobly when you try to use it as a writing table while all the screws are fully tightened. That is the only reason for my 3-star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Sripada

customer_reviews.title: How do I get a refund or another sent?
customer_reviews.text: The table was way too hard to put together, physically impossible with the Allen Wrench given in the box. The screws labeled A that where to be used in the table legs did not properly fits inside their given hole causing a stripped screw. I even tried loosening the screw hole before a actually tried putting it in the table and it caused the piece in the table to come out. Even IF I was able to screw the screw in most of the way it would just start splitting the leg on the other side. Could not put together the table at all
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Cute and small for apartment with small kitchen space
customer_reviews.text: The counter top is beautiful to look at it dis come chipped so thata disappointing but no big deal I guess. The legs feel alittle unreliable when I move it around it seems that you have to pick it up when you move it rather than slide it because the legs feel they might break. Chairs are comfy but same thing I'm afraid they will break if you slide them so pic them up. My 3 yr old gets up and down easily with the bar at the bottom so that is awesome
customer_reviews.author: Angelique Duran

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I saw this set on Wayfair for way more and decided to see if it was available on Amazon. The reviews threw me off and I was hesitant...I added it to my cart and the next day it was on sale for a really great price. It’s been almost a month after receiving this set and I am so glad I got it! Easy to assemble. The top was scratch free and has been. I was scared to put any drinks on it but it’s still in a perfect condition. Great for small space and looks beautiful too.
customer_reviews.author: Tabby Bull

customer_reviews.title: Impressive for the price
customer_reviews.text: This table looks really nice and works for the price. Its great for small spaces and a single or two-person home. I was worried about the quality, being sort of wobbly, but I think you'd have to try to break it- it's not going to just fall apart. It wasn't too difficult to assemble, although I needed to use an extra small screwdriver not included. Every single little decorative knob you put in the chairs last fell out. I'd have to glue them in to stay but I don't care that much. Over time, I might worry about the edges of the decorative sticker top peeling as you clean it, but you really can't complain too much for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bibbles

customer_reviews.title: Stool broke within two days
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking set, and was relatively easy to assemble, but one of the cross-bars on the stool broke within two days of assembling it. The bar just snapped right in half from the weight of a person's foot resting on it. The stools in general are not very sturdy, and are able to wobble quite a bit even with all the hardware installed and tightened properly.
customer_reviews.author: Jason and Heather

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Awesome table set for the price! My only complaint is that one of the stools is a bit wobbly because 1 of its legs is just a tad shorter than the other 7 stool legs. I'd put something under it to stabilize it if it was the table but it's not possible to do that with a stool that is constantly being moved. Living with it seemed more rational than disassembling the whole thing, attempting to repackage it then haul it to a UPS or FedEx store on the hope that the replacement wouldn't have the same issue. Other than that ... it's well manufactured, sturdy, gorgeous and the perfect size
customer_reviews.author: Rynkydynk

customer_reviews.title: Good Thing My Wife Likes It
customer_reviews.text: My wife ordered this product to replace a round pub table taking up too much space. It arrived mostly intact in a well packed box. Assembly is easy if everything fits. It does not. Had to drill out some pieces and shave wood off the legs in order to fit properly. Not the greatest quality but repacking and sending it back was more work than repairing the fit and finish. I would have sent it back but again my wife likes it. If you have some talent and tools, I guess this is OK. Good thing my wife likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S

customer_reviews.title: Decent table, but came in damaged.
customer_reviews.text: I received the product in a torn up box that look like it been from hell on the way to me. My boyfriend managed to put the table together but upon viewing the table I noticed that the table is not actual granite it's like a sticky plastic paper with a hard outer shell. Corner of the table part of the granite sticker is ripped off. Also there is a dent on the granite part of the table that is visible to the eye when walking past it. I definitely don't think this table was worth what I paid for it especially because of all the damage.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Miller

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an inexpensive counter height table for my family room. I came across the Linon Tavern and was excited to get a nice looking table set for the price. Nice table but I believe I received a return of damaged goods. One leg is wobbly, the support for the base was cracked and there are two areas on the table itself that are dented. We hadn't yet put the chairs together as we have two other bar stools we planned to use. I am afraid to see if there are any damages there. I will try and remember to take pics and update my rating.
customer_reviews.author: Mamibrasilera

customer_reviews.title: Great product for small spaces!
customer_reviews.text: I use this all the time when I have company over in my small studio. It was pretty easy to assemble, but the only thing I disliked about the product is that all the items that you use to assemble the table were all in the same bag. When we were assembling it we accidentally used some screws that were for a different part of the table, but it still worked out. I would just recommend separating the screws before starting because they look pretty similar. Overall, the product works well, it saves me space and it's super convenient. You can use this table for many things in the kitchen, its easy to use, and very multi-functional.
customer_reviews.author: Licelotte Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: CAME BUSTED CHEAPLY MADE STAY AWAT FROM THIS SET!
customer_reviews.text: RUN RUN RUN my friends from this product (table & stools), I received the product and I just cried as my hard earned money, I am on a fixed income was so wasted. The table was all busted up beyond what one could ever believe, way way beyond repair the table top was broken, sharp edges & I cut myself badly, the only thing that came through okay was the 2 benches but what good are they to me now???? JUST HORRID and folks my advise is run for the hills from this one.... Enough said.
customer_reviews.author: V. J.

customer_reviews.title: Expensive sleek look and feel for the low !!
customer_reviews.text: It’s way wider and taller than I expected but I still think it’s great for small spaces. It’s amazing. I’ve wanted this for so long ..... finally got it and I am very pleased. It’s very sturdy and looks and feels expensive. The only downside is you have to almost be a genius to put this together. Took quite sometime. I would highly recommend having a second hand to help put it together. Overall I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Worst Amazon Purchase Ever
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the worst product I have ever purchased on amazon. First, the table was damaged on the corner. Second, the screws look used and abused. There are no extra screws provided and one of the screws was defective, leading me to assemble the table without one screw. Also, one of the legs was not plush to the table, leading to a huge gap between the leg and table itself. I desperately need a table due to working from home with COVID. The table is not sturdy at all even on the legs with fully working screws. It is not even worth returning. I have submitted an order for a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's really sturdy!  Nice value and well made.
customer_reviews.text: Ours had some damage on one corner of one stool where it wasn't too noticable-a cracked piece of wood that was missing some of the wood. It looked to me like it happened during manufacturing. I glued it, clamped it and puttied the defect, then painted it. The flaw was not worth returning the whole thing so we took care of it. The table and stools are high quality and sturdy. We love the way it looks in our den and it adds a fun workspace to the room.
customer_reviews.author: deb

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty pleased and pleasantly surprised with this set. The only problem I ran into was one of the chairs is missing two predrilled holes to screw the seat on, but thankfully my husband is pretty handy and that's an easy thing he can fix. It's really sturdy and was simple to assemble. I'm making a coffee bar in our bedroom and this was perfect for our space.
customer_reviews.author: Téa Filippini

customer_reviews.title: Cheap crap
customer_reviews.text: Piece of garbage. One of the stools pieces had the holes drilled in the wrong portion rendering it completely useless. And the stool that I was actually able to put together was wobbly and not sturdy because one of the legs is shorter than the rest. Waste of money and waste of time. Very upset with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cass&Kyle

customer_reviews.title: really ties the room together
customer_reviews.text: I have a small apt with limited counterspace. This baby gives me extra counterspace, two more seats, and creates a nice little kitchen lagoon for me to cook in. The table is the exact height of my counter, another plus. Not the hardest to put together, but b/c I'm not the best handyman, the table and one of the stools are a little wobbly (the other stool is perfect, which leads me to believe it's assembler error). But even with a minor wobble, I still love this thing. Best piece of furniture I own
customer_reviews.author: Matthew S Heibel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome table for a small space
customer_reviews.text: This table perfectly fits our small apartment. It’s a much better option than eating at our coffee table. It does comfortably fit 2 plates or 2 laptops across from each other if you scooch a bit to either side. I think it was easy to put together (I didn’t actually participate in this because my boyfriend says I am too bossy when we’re trying to put furniture together). The “marble” is lovely and very neutral to match most decors. The only downside for me is that the edges are sharp. If you rest your arms on them, it’s a little uncomfortable. But overall a great table.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good looking wobbly table
customer_reviews.text: I got this because its tabletop dimensions were a bit larger than what else I was seeing online for a similar price. Its too shaky to sit at and write. and the little wooden circles provided to cover the screws do not work; they just fall out. I put this table in my living room, against the wall in the corner, for an extra space to hang out( you know, like drink, eat and watch tv type stuff)- it works great for that. But again, you can not write a check at this table. you can not draw or color either. I would buy another of these, for 50 dollars less.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the price. It’s good for our occasional use but not sure how well it would hold to daily wear and tear. It looks decent and is very sturdy. The ‘cheapest’ aspect of it is the edge around the top surface isn’t a shiny surface like the top...it’s the same pattern but not a finished coating...it’s like paper with little or no protective finish. So as an ‘occasional’ table it’s great but for daily dining probably not.
customer_reviews.author: terrig

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and great for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: I loved it from the first time I saw it on Walmart website but I saw that Amazon had it for cheaper. We moved into a new apartment and the kitchen is small and cozy so this actually fits really well. I took a try at it cause I'm 280 pounds and my husband is 240 and we both fit comfortably on the chair. It's a good buy and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: QUEEN OKURT

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the price
customer_reviews.text: We have this set for over 4 years now and it survived everything we put it through - including being taken apart, put in storage for 3 months and being reassembled after moving. The chairs are of course not top quality but it definitely is worth the 150$ we paid :) All around happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Faby

customer_reviews.title: Cute inexpensive table
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute little table, and great when extra table space is needed around the holidays. But I had to return the first one for replacement as it had 2 bowed legs and a major chip on the edge of the table top. A word of advice, look each piece over well before assembling. We didn't do that, and had to take it apart after noticing the defects. Amazon promptly sent a replacement and picked up the return.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Nice, sturdy table. Bigger and taller than expected but it’s a good piece for the price
customer_reviews.text: I got the table 2 weeks ago. It came with wears and tears and looked much like a used one. Contacted customer service and they sent out a brand new one for me FOR FREE which I was pretty happy about. It took my husband like 15-20mins to assemble it with drills and other tools. The table is pretty sturdy and the color is nice. I just wish that I would read the description more carefully to know how high it actually is. It’s much higher than I thought :(
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Great construction with quirks
customer_reviews.text: This came packaged very well, the assembly was also very easy. The only downside was that they give you little wood circles to cover the stool screws - they don’t fit well and pop out too easily. I would buy some glue too glue them - however I ended up opting to remove them instead. The construction is great for the price. I’ve stood on the stool to change our a light bulb and not had them break. The table is also well built but the laminate top is extremely thin (which is fine in this price range).
customer_reviews.author: drew Miller

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it
customer_reviews.text: This is really cute. It fits perfectly where I wanted it. One of the legs on one of the stools is a little warped, but I didn't want to bother with taking it all back apart and returning for one warped leg. The stool still holds up fine. We've had people weighing 280 lbs using the stools and they're sturdy. I haven't had to retighten the bolts yet.
customer_reviews.author: A D

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen Island
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item for usage by my grandchildren who are staying with me for a year while their parents are deployed. I did not want them to damage my dining room table and saw this item and thought it a perfect fit not only for the grandchildren but also for my kitchen.......it is like finally having an island in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Black

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for small kitchens!
customer_reviews.text: Living in a NYC apartment doesn't give much counter space but this did the trick! I love it. The stools to sit on that can be pushed underneath is a plus too. BUT assembling the chairs was a hassle. You need a drill or some sort of electronic screwdriver to attach the cushions.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: it's a most buy perfect for a small area
customer_reviews.text: Love it a must buy thanks to the seller I first looked at tge reviews alot of people complaining about this product I was afraid to buy it but I trust in God and it amazing it fits in my very small apartment kitchen perfectly and its so up to date very stylish 😀 and the chairs are strong and sturdy so is the table thanks to the seller
customer_reviews.author: LadyH

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece
customer_reviews.text: This 3-piece tavern set is beautiful. It came packed very well so I was surprised it had a fairly large crack on the side of top table. I did not want to return, so Amazon discounted item for me in form of a credit, will secure it with glue so crack stays put, love Amazon! Because of the crack I gave it a 4 star, if not it would have gotten 5 stars! Amazon gets a 5 Star on customer service. Oh, and I do not do any kind of install on anything but the instructions and easy to build tools, this was easy, thorough and quick to build. Very, very happy with this piece.
customer_reviews.author: Nora Dinsmore

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for two
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect breakfast nook. I did have to get help while putting the seats together bc one side would come undone while trying to do the other, but overall it wasn’t terrible. The screws that go in the bottom of the cushions all came out after sitting on them. Maybe that’s just operator error, but it didn’t want to go in any farther when screwing in. Overall I like it tho.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Love it but missing holes in the stool  Legs
customer_reviews.text: We purchased 2 of these tables the 1st one came no problems beautiful table love it purchase a second when to go side-by-side on a long wall the 2nd table and chairs the stool didn't have holes in the legs to put it together. Still love the table really don't need the extra stool however I want what I paid for so I'm calling Amazon but I don't wanna send the whole thing back otherwise this table is sturdy beautiful and fits our needs
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Solorzano

customer_reviews.title: Great makeup table!
customer_reviews.text: I have a small amount of space in my room for furniture, but needed a place to put on makeup where I could sit comfortably, and have access to a magnification mirror, as my eyesight isn't what it used to be. Not only is the table sturdy and of a perfect height for this task, it fits perfectly in the space, the stools are comfortable to sit upon, and the table top design is beautiful. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: S. Fitzgibbon

customer_reviews.title: Solid set for the price! The 'marble' actually definitely makes it!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered it on the 8th, got it today the 10th, free shipping. Took the lady and I less than an hour, probably less than 30 minutes to assemble. The table and stools seem sturdy but the table gives a bit of a wobble. Be careful not to overtighten screws on the table and stools! They all go in easy and I don't even think the screws for the stool seats are needed, as mentioned in another review. Overall we got more than what I expected for a good price. Nice solid set. Thanks Amazon 👍
customer_reviews.author: AaRon Sharkler

customer_reviews.title: VERY CUTE SUPER EASY TO SET UP!
customer_reviews.text: I REALLY LOVE this table! Awesome price & perfect for my small kitchen. The stools are VERY comfortable. The cushion really does make up for not having the back support on the chair. It is also SUPER EASY to set up! I, the woman of the house, set the entire thing up while my husband was at work. It shows you a picture w/ letters & all the parts have letters just put it together. I used every single piece ut came w/ so the only thing that this doesn't provide is a mallet to hammer those little wooden pieces into the stools so u dont see the screws. THANK YOU SO MUCH FOR THIS TABLE LOOKS SO CUTE !
customer_reviews.author: Ivelisse Romero

customer_reviews.title: One bad stool
customer_reviews.text: Was really loving it as I was putting it together. Then get to the final stool and one of the holes isn't drilled correctly on the top rung and can't get the bolt to line up with the little metal peice no matter how I twist it. even tried boring the hole out a little more so the peg would fit in it but don't work at all. So now I have a defective stool
customer_reviews.author: Zen'd In

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality bar stools
customer_reviews.text: Purchase date September 20, 2019, return window October 24, 2019, today is November 23, 2019. My stools were falling apart a month later. This is how they look in the video and the picture. This was installed by Amazon installers btw. Now I need to buy 2 more stools to sit on, this time i'm going to a second hand store.
customer_reviews.author: Eriqa

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I got this set with the box damaged. Inside the table was missing parts and the fake wood siding the hold the legs were cracked. I had to get some wood screws to hold everything in place as i got this for a party that i was having and it was too late to return it. I wouldn't recommend this to anyone. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a small space
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for a small space, Fairly easy for one person to put together. The only downfall is one of the bolts was stripped, So one of the legs wobbles a tad. Overall worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Gusta

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturing defect, cost-effective product.
customer_reviews.text: My parts had one manufacturing defect making it un-assemble-able without modification. The depth of the hole was not deep enough to allow for the drop-in nut. Had to use a spade bit to drill it out myself. Product is otherwise cost-effective at $100 and it’s convenient to have the chairs underneath. However, a few cons. The legs of the table and chairs bend rather easily, and the overall design makes it easy for the legs to not be perpendicular to the ground. The table is very light — this makes it convenient for moving, but also makes it very easy to accidentally move when using. Decent product, but wouldn’t pay more than the $100 we paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Palisoc

customer_reviews.title: Great cheap table for a small place
customer_reviews.text: This table works great for our small NYC apartment! It was pretty easy to put together, too. The only reason I bumped it down a star was because the stools do not feel the most sturdy. One is fine, but the other one's screws keep falling out and it feels super wobbly and unsafe so we ended up buying new stools from Ikea to sit on. Love the table otherwise though and it serves our needs!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Lilley

customer_reviews.title: Missing hardware and damaged
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t have all the screws and hardware, came broken on one corner, but it’s a corner that can’t be seen, so I kept it instead of returning it. It’s ok, would have been nice if they put the correct number of bolts, screws and nuts (hardware) with the product. Kind of hard to put this thing together without the hardware!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Good but maybe non-durable
customer_reviews.text: This looks really good but I think it might be on the non-durable side. After I assemble it , I saw a little Chip on the side and I wonder where it came from? I assemble the table on a soft surface without any hassle because it was that easy to assemble but I still see a cracked on it. I might need a protector for it.
customer_reviews.author: Pink8

customer_reviews.title: Unaligned
customer_reviews.text: I was weary about buying this based off the reviews and I'm going to tell you to save your money... there was a manufacturing mistake where the hole cut outs of the table are far off from the screw inserts of the leg therefore it will not lineup at all. It's off by over a quarter inch.. 105 bucks wasted on a table that's leg can't even attach. Trusting amazon was my mistake. Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: From a grown to a smile
customer_reviews.text: The first time the table set came, the box looked like a Bear had it's way with it. The table itself was in bad shape also with no stools, it was returned and a new table set was sent to me. I noticed the contents was prepared differently upon opening the box and the table set was intact. Would give 5 stars but I did notice a dime size peeled layer on top of the table....smh Besides that it's a good looking table set nice and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Damien Martin

customer_reviews.title: Need to maximize your dollars AND your space? Buy this set.
customer_reviews.text: This bistro/tavern table and stools set is a GREAT value for the cost. I’m using it for staging a Mother-in-law/executive efficiency apartment & it’s perfect. I read other reviews that talked about delivery damage - I decided to order anyway and if there was minor damage where it couldn’t be seen & didn’t affect structural integrity, then it was worth it for me to use some super glue & a touch up furniture pen to make repairs. We had no damage & everything looked great. To summarize: Easy to assemble, quality appearance, sturdy, Prime shipping in 3 days to Alaska AND it costs less than 130 bucks. Really this is a no-brainer. Great purchase & excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: C.W.

customer_reviews.title: Love it and very stylish
customer_reviews.text: I am a travel nurse and was looking for inexpensive furnishings for my short term apartment. This was nicer and cheaper than anything I found at Salvation Army or Goodwill. Remember to tighten the screws after it is put together or the joints will be loose and pull apart. Of course, I am a grown adult so I don't know how it would hold up to the abuse of children.
customer_reviews.author: StorkRN

customer_reviews.title: Would Recommend
customer_reviews.text: We have a small apartment and my fiance is 6'3". Finding a hightop to fit in a small space and be tall enough for him was very difficult. This is perfectly sized for both. It is sleek and overall good quality. One of the stools kept having the screws fall out so the cushion would fall off. I think my fiance used longer screws to ensure they would hold and they have. The stools are also a little wobbly, but overall it does the trick. I think it's well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Seremela

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: The package was damaged a little but the pieces weren't. Several of the screws to hold the tabletop to the wood frame were loose or completely out and scattered in the packaging. All the hardware was included. I mean, it looks nice, but most of those screws to hold the tabletop to the frame won't tighten. I will hope for the best that it doesn't come apart. Since it's just me, it should be ok.
customer_reviews.author: angiek

customer_reviews.title: Sad quality and poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our new apartment before we moved. Kept in storage until the date of the move. Now that we are ready to set it up I open the box and find the instructions are incomplete (not telling you to place screws in places that need them) and there aren't even enough screws to make it up on your own. I started with the stools but when I realized I didnt have enough hardware I moved onto the table. When I unboxed the table I found the corner was destroyed. So now I have a table and 2 stools I cant use because its damaged and I don't have enough hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very impressed with item
customer_reviews.text: I am not the type of person who likes putting things together but I found this table and chair to be easy. The diagram is to the point and it took me no time at all. It is a great addition to my kitchen where I need something to eat on....would recommend without hesitation
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was absolutely the perfect size for my small eat in kitchen. It was very easy to assemble. It took me about 45 minutes to assemble. For the reviews about the screws for the cushions, use a power drill, and the screws go in with now problem. There was not any damage to any of the pieces. I honestly couldn’t be happier! Great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: A great table/desk for me.
customer_reviews.text: I love this table/desk for me. Along with a chair  that sits high enough, I can surf the web and eat at a wonderful table set up. A lucky event to have the printer under the table and still have enough leg room too! :-) I was able to have the table together less than an hour for having two and my system back up and running less than two hour.
customer_reviews.author: Tamika

customer_reviews.title: Great value, excellent design, looks more expensive than it is!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this set for my son's man cave. He needed something that he could use as both a space to eat and also something to sit at to do work on his computer. This satisfied both purposes. Very sturdy, excellent quality, and it looks way more expensive than it really is. Worth the purchase. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: TeacherMom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent table for the price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent table for the price. The stools seem a little weak, but the table is sturdy. I suspect within in a year I'll be replacing the stools. I expected that anyway for a 3 piece set at this price. If you want better quality, buy a more expensive set.
customer_reviews.author: Greg F.

customer_reviews.title: Good and Cheap!
customer_reviews.text: I have a cottage for a house and space is sparse, but not terrible, this is long enough for two people. Enough room for two to eat. Prewarning if you are a bigger person the weight limit on the stools is 250lbs. The stool are uncomfortable and painful to sit on sometimes. The table is made of cheaper materials, you can tell but none the less makes a room much more attractive. The table looks to be a cherry coloring in the light, almost brown with the curtains drawn. To end off my review, I would recommend it for a cheap alternative. Unfortunately everyone is not made of money, and this is good enough
customer_reviews.author: Jalisa

customer_reviews.title: Check thoroughly
customer_reviews.text: My husband finally assembled it today. Was disappointed that there were chips, cracks and scratches, was supposed to be new.
customer_reviews.author: dmuz

customer_reviews.title: Cute table but one of the dowels were broken when received
customer_reviews.text: Perfect set but one of the dowels were broken when received and the seller will not send a replacement although I already put the table and stools together. It would take too much time to take apart and pay for return shipping. Save yourself a bit of grief and don't buy this until there is another way to remedy issues.
customer_reviews.author: Pauline

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged, bad customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Table arrived with a large dent on the side of the tabletop. Couldn't reach customer support by phone (dead line), and my web request has gone unanswered for a week. Assembly was tolerable, but it's very hard to get the screws into the cushions to hold them to the stools (I could only get three of four in each cushion). It looks decent, and is cheap enough, but I still feel it's more hassle than it's worth. Update 4/19/2017: Seven months after ordering and having my requests to customer service go unanswered, a replacement tabletop arrived at my door yesterday with no prior announcement. This is long after I returned the table to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: A. Busch

customer_reviews.title: Look no further! You’ve found the one!!
customer_reviews.text: Made for a perfect height and depth for coffee/breakfast bar !!! You’ll have plenty of room for a keurig and more ! Assembly was so simple didn’t even need the instructions (but they do have them) very fancy looking & best price I found on something like this I may buy another one so kids can join us for a seat ! Love it !!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap product with high probability of damage in transit
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived damaged. One of the corners was cracked due to impact in transit or in warehouse. Did not want to go through the hassle if packing it and then returning it. Amazon was kind enough to offer a discount. One of the wooden pieces to assemble the stool was missing two holes as well. Had to drill them myself. Quality and feel is cheap to be honest and the risk of damage in transit is also high. Given the chance, I would have spent $30 more snd bought a higher quality product. I know this will not last long.
customer_reviews.author: Abid Rehman

customer_reviews.title: Wobbly and peeling
customer_reviews.text: I set up this table and within a week the corners and edges of the paper coating were peeling. The table wobbles some, but the chairs quickly loosened screws and now are at the point you can't put anything to rest on them as they will wobble. The paper coating peeling was very disappointing, and wasn't something that was clear to me from reading other reviews. Honestly, I've had this table for about a month now, and it already needs to be replaced. I sought it out for the size, which works great, but it is not sturdy, and the table is not good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie R. Leone

product_meta.title: Linon Brown 3-Piece Table Faux Marble Tavern Set, 42" w x 22.25" d x 36" h
product_meta.description: Color:BrownTavern 3 Piece Counter Set with space saving convenience. This set features a simple rectangular table on long sturdy legs with two backless counter height stools with padded, black vinyl seat covers. Made from solid woods and a faux stone paper wrapped top. The rich Espresso finish gives this piece an elegant and sophisticated appeal. The stools tuck neatly under the table when not in use.
feature_bullets: Your purchase includes One Linon Tavern Collection 3-Piece Table Set |1 Counter height table, 2 padded counter stools & all tools required for assembly
Dimensions: Table – 42.25” W x 22.13” D x 36.25” H | Stool (each) – 13.75” W x 13.75” D x 25” H | Table Weight Capacity – 200 lbs. | Stool weight capacity (each) – 275 lbs.
Hardwood construction with espresso finish; faux stone paper-wrapped tabletop
Padded stool seats with black vinyl upholstery; stools tuck under table for storage
Space saving and convenient design. It can also fit in your man cave, den or kitchen nook as an additional dining area
Attractive 3-piece table set from Linon's Tavern collection; set includes rectangular table and 2 stools
Hardwood construction with espresso finish; faux stone paper-wrapped table top
Padded stool seats with black vinyl upholstery; stools tuck under table for storage
Requires home assembly; assembled table measures 42 inches wide by 22-1/4 inches deep by 36 inches high
Space saving design and convenience.It can also fit in your man cave, den or kitchen nook as an additional dining area

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars3,825 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
specifications.Warranty Description: Linon guarantees that product will be free from defects in material and workmanship for 30 days from purchase date. Linon will replace any missing or defective parts for a period of 6 months from the date of purchase.
